data.enText: a person who uses the services or advice of a professional person or organization

data.chText: 拥有许多著名委托人的律师
data.enText: a lawyer with many famous clients
to act on behalf of a client

data.chText: 社会工作者必须时刻考虑其当事人的最佳利益。
data.enText: Social workers must always consider the best interests of their clients.
a computer that is linked to a server

ex.chText: 委托人太穷了，付不起律师的诉讼费用。
ex.enText: The client was too poor to pay his lawyer.

ex.chText: 这将使我们以后能更好地服务客户。
ex.enText: It will enable us to serve our clients even better in the future.

ex.chText: 公司要求客户提前支付一大笔费用。
ex.enText: The company required the clients to pay a large sum in advance.

synonyms.bx: 指接受专业人士、公司、组织等提供的服务或建议的人。

ex.chText: 客户需要最好的产品和服务。
ex.enText: Consumers need the best products and the best services.

ex.chText: 如今，许多消费者更愿意在网上购物。
ex.enText: Nowadays, many consumers prefer to shop on the Internet.

ex.chText: 公司把上涨的价格都转嫁到了消费者身上。
ex.enText: The price increases were passed on by the company to the consumers.

synonyms.bx: 指花钱购买商品和服务的人。

ex.chText: 几名顾客走进来买了同样的夹克衫。
ex.enText: Several customers came in and bought the same jackets.

ex.chText: 街对面新开张的商店挖走了我的一些顾客。
ex.enText: The new shop across the street has taken away some of my customers.
She was a regular customer at the fish market.

ex.chText: 那所学校是我们最大的客户之一。
ex.enText: That school is one of our biggest customers.

synonyms.bx: 普通用词，含义较笼统，多指从某一商场或公司购买东西的人或机构。

ex.chText: 这些新用户对我们的产品很满意。
ex.enText: The new users are satisfied with our products.

ex.chText: 这家工厂是该地区的一个用电大户。
ex.enText: The factory is a big user of electricity in this area.

synonyms.bx: 指商品、服务等的使用者，通常为人、企业等。

tr: (computer science) any computer that is hooked up to a computer network
someone who pays for goods or services
a person who seeks the advice of a lawyer

value.def: A client of a professional person or organization is a person or company that receives a service from them in return for payment.

example.ex: The company required clients to pay substantial fees in advance.
example.tran: 公司要求客户预付一大笔费用。

value.boxu_tran: 接受律师、会计师等的专业服务的人就是他们的client(委托人);从某个商店或公司购买商品的人就是他们的customer(顾客)。医生、医院接待patients(病人)，旅馆接待guests(客人)。乘公共交通工具的人叫做passengers(乘客)。
value.boxu_usage: If you use the professional services of someone such as a lawyer or an accountant, you are one of their clients. When you buy goods from a particular shop or company, you are one of its customers. Doctors and hospitals have patients, while hotels have guests. People who travel on public transport are referred to as passengers.

trans: 致命内幕；终极证人；委托人；客户；終極證人
胖客户端；肥客户端；胖客户机；胖客户；胖客户端模型
邮件客户机；电子邮件客户端
客户机验证；客户验证；客户认证；客户机认证；户鉴别
